Posts.Content: hi noj i had my first taxotere last week and ended up in hospital for a week as i was nuetropenic i am so scared to get my next one. I was just wondering how your nails fell off ive not seen that on the side effects info and oh oooccchhh how sore was that and is there anything i can do to stop it my nails were so sore i had to cut them off last week . any advisewould be good thanks kemp xxxxx
Posts.Title: Docetaxel - advice on what to expect!
